Package com.bws.jdistil.core.tag.data

Class ValueComponent

java.lang.Object
javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.BodyTagSupport
com.bws.jdistil.core.tag.basic.Component
com.bws.jdistil.core.tag.data.ValueComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.BodyTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.DynamicAttributes, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.IterationTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TryCatchFinally
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionData, AssociateField, AssociateListField, CheckField, DateField, DisplayAssociateField, DisplayAssociateListField, DisplayField, DisplayListField, DisplayMultipleListField, EmailField, ExcludeActionFields, ExcludeField, Fields, HiddenField, IncludeActionFields, IncludeField, ListField, MemoField, MultipleListField, MultipleListGroup, PasswordField, PhoneNumberField, TextField, TimeField
public abstract class ValueComponent extends Component
Abstract base component containing attributes common to all value UI components.
Author:
- Bryan Snipes

    • getFieldValue

      protected Object getFieldValue(String attributeName, String fieldId, boolean isMultiple)
      Returns the component's field value or values using an attribute name and field ID. The attribute name is used to retrieve a field accessible object from the request attributes and the field ID is used to retrieve the field's associated property value. The multiple value indicator ensures a collection of values is returned when data is retrieved from the request parameters. This property has no impact when data is retrieved from a field accessible object's associated property value.
      Parameters:
      attributeName - - Attribute name.
      fieldId - - Field ID.
      isMultiple - Multiple value indicator.
      Returns:
      Object - Field value.

    • getFormattedFieldValue

      protected String getFormattedFieldValue(String attributeName, String fieldId) throws UiException
      Returns the component's field value as a formatted string using an attribute name and field ID. The attribute name is used to retrieve a field accessible object from the request attributes and the field ID is used to retrieve the field's associated property value.
      Parameters:
      attributeName - - Attribute name.
      fieldId - - Field ID.
      Returns:
      String - Formatted field value.
      Throws:
      UiException

    • getFormattedFieldValues
